page.title: 04MILL GREEN MUSEUM 2
page.content: mill were cleaned and repaired. Since l980 much more work has been doen to restore the mill and its machinery. The building is very cold and has been changed and patched up by different millers. The curator hopes to find out more about how it used to be from the last millers daughter who is 84 years old and now lives in New Zealand. The old mill wheel had rotted away under the water. A new breast shot wheel just like the old one is being made and will be in place by l986. The remains of the old wheel which is at least 250 years old will be on display in the grounds. The mill should be restored to full working order in l986. It will be the only working mill within 50 miles. About l7,500 people visit the water mill at Mill Green each year and soon they
